类 RequestWindowController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.RequestWindowController
  • public class RequestWindowController
extends java.lang.Object
    CONTROLLER in MVC: the controller module that carry out the HTTP requests, invokes the model methods and then update the GUI

    • 方法详细资料

      • logIn

        public void logIn​(java.lang.String emailKey,
                  java.lang.String emailFrom,
                  java.lang.String emailTo,
                  java.lang.String emailReply,
                  java.lang.String senderName,
                  java.lang.String targetName,
                  java.lang.String replyName)
        Assigning the data to the fields.

        Preconditions:
        None
        Postconditions:
        data will be assigned to the fields of the instance.
        参数:
        emailKey - The email api key, may not be NULL or Empty.
        emailFrom - The email address you want to use to send the email, may not be NULL or Empty.
        emailTo - The email address you want to use to send the email, may not be NULL or Empty.
        emailReply - The email address you want to use to receive the reply form the receiver, may not be NULL or Empty.
        senderName - The name of the person who send the email, may not be NULL or Empty.
        targetName - The name of the person who receive the email, may not be NULL or Empty.
        replyName - The name of the person who receive the reply from the receiver, may not be NULL or Empty.

      • run

        public void run()

      • checkCache

        public boolean checkCache​(java.lang.String word)
        check if the given word has been stored in the database before

        Preconditions:
        None
        Postconditions:
        None.
        参数:
        word - The given word from user input.
        返回:
        true if the given word has been stored in cache before, false otherwise.

      • retrieveData

        public java.lang.String retrieveData​(java.lang.String word,
                                     boolean fromCache)
        Retrieve the data describing the given word either from database or api.

        Preconditions:
        None
        Postconditions:
        None.
        参数:
        word - The given word from user input.
        fromCache - ture: retrieve data from database; false retrieve data from api
        返回:
        data about the given word in the form of String

      • reportData

        public void reportData​(java.lang.String subject,
                       java.lang.String value)
        send the email with the given subject and content

        Preconditions:
        None
        Postconditions:
        An Message box will be displayed on the GUI indicating the success of email sending.
        参数:
        subject - The subject or title of the email.
        value - The content of the email

      • updateView

        public void updateView​(java.lang.String input)
        display a given text on the GUI text area.

        Preconditions:
        None
        Postconditions:
        None.
        参数:
        input - The input data to display on the GUI text area
